Stan Dyck wrote:
> Is there a requirement that the Media Type of the PUTted entity be the 
> same as the Media Type of the resource that is being replaced?

The media type is just of the (zero to many) entity, not the resource. 
Hence you can certainly PUT in a different media type than you GET.
